text: This article displays the rosters for the participating teams at the 2016 South American Basketball Championship. The player ages are as of June 26, which was the first day of the tournament. == Group A == === Bolivia === ===Ecuador=== === Paraguay === == Group B == ===Chile=== ===Colombia=== ===Peru=== ===Uruguay=== == References == == External links == *ARCHIVE.FIBA.COM Category:South American Basketball Championship squads Category:2016 in South American sport
title: 2016 South American Basketball Championship squads
